Sentencas: In order to benefit from the high electrochemical efficiency of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), a detailed balance of plant (BOP) has to be developed.
Titulo: Optimization of a 200 kW SOFC cogeneration power plant - Part I: Variation of process parameters

Sentencas: An energetic and economic analysis of a decentralized natural gas-fuelled SOFC-power plant in the range of 200 kW capacity is carried out, All calculations start from a basic plant concept with a simple flowsheet and a basic parameter set of SOFC operation and economic data.
Titulo: Optimization of a 200 kW SOFC cogeneration power plant - Part I: Variation of process parameters

Sentencas: Changes in costs of electricity (COE) and plant efficiency are determined for the variation of cell operation parameters.
Titulo: Optimization of a 200 kW SOFC cogeneration power plant - Part I: Variation of process parameters

Sentencas: This includes the influence of air temperature increase in the stack, degree of internal reforming, cell voltage and fuel utilization.
Titulo: Optimization of a 200 kW SOFC cogeneration power plant - Part I: Variation of process parameters

Sentencas: The results indicate two classes of cell parameters.
Titulo: Optimization of a 200 kW SOFC cogeneration power plant - Part I: Variation of process parameters

Sentencas: Cell voltage and fuel utilization show a cost optimum characteristic, whereas the other parameters have a uniform influence on efficiency and costs of electricity.
Titulo: Optimization of a 200 kW SOFC cogeneration power plant - Part I: Variation of process parameters
